review: I already have a laptop hooked up to my TV so I haven't optimized this like I could.  I also wish that there was a web browser, but then I'm probably asking for too much.
author: Bob D.

review: Works fine the only drawback is the only local media you can stream is mp4, but I hear vlc will change that with a future update.
author: David Lynn

review: I am wondering why I spent so much money on buying a Smart TV now.  I plugged this up to one of my cheap flat screen TVs and it works better than my expensive Smart TV.  I love the "cast screen" feature because it allows me to do everything I want as I can view every app on my phone through my TV now.  I just wish I had the cast screen feature on my Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 like I do on Samsung 4 Cell Phone.  That's the only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars.
author: Erika

review: The Chromecast is a great product!  I do wish it had a little better wifi connection, but with something this small, I'm not sure it can be helped.  It works great!
author: Todd L. Wilkerson

review: arrived VERY quickly, with in 48 hrs of order, set up in 5 minutes, works like a charm.
author: James A Gold
